{"id":1086548519,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"1 month, 1 week","timestamp":1698552368,"status":15,"status_display":"Runtime Error","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/1086548519/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Find the K-or of an Array","memory":"N/A","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    bool ithBitSetForK(vector<int> arr, int i, int k) {\n        int count=0;\n        for(int x:arr) if(x&(1<<i)) count++;\n        return count>=k;\n    }\n    unsigned int countBits(int x) {\n        return (unsigned int)log2(x)+1;\n    }\n    int findKOr(vector<int>& nums, int k) {\n        int kOr=0,maxBitCount=countBits(*max_element(nums.begin(),nums.end()));\n        for(int i=0;i<maxBitCount;i++) if(ithBitSetForK(nums,i,k)) kOr+=pow(2,i);\n        return kOr;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"find-the-k-or-of-an-array","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
